question: What should be done if missed one rakaat of Fajr and made salaam when Imam had made it?
answer:
QUESTION
I have missed one rakaat in Fajr with Imam. But when Imam made salaam. I also made (both sides) by mistake. After this I came to know that I have done a mistake. Now whether I can make my one rakaat or I have to repeat the whole?
ANSWER


Share:
You should repeat the entire Salaat.

Was salaam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
